thread.title: Tom Hanks finds student ID, uses twitter to let "Lauren" know
thread.title_full: Tom Hanks finds student ID, uses twitter to let "Lauren" know | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Rick Couri
title: Tom Hanks finds student ID, uses twitter to let "Lauren" know
text:
"Lauren! I found your Student ID in the park," the tweet begins. The multi Oscar-winner follows with, “if you still need it my office will get to you. Hanx."
Lauren is a Fordham University student who told Good Morning America , she lost the ID while jogging in Central Park.
Lauren! I found your Student ID in the park. If you still need it my office will get to you. Hanx. pic.twitter.com/Ee9kK4V4qf
— Tom Hanks (@tomhanks) October 6, 2015 Lauren says she hasn’t heard from the star’s office, but admits she’d like to have it back even though she “had to pay $20 to get a new one.”
>> Read more trending stories
The psychology major told the network, "I'm not on Twitter,” and had no idea Hanks was making her famous.
Lucky for Lauren, one of her professors is an active Twitter user. He alerted her by email as she was “sitting in the library trying to get homework done.” He only used two words: “‘You’re famous.’”
While Lauren didn’t answer the tweet, dozens of others did. Check out their comments below.
@tomhanks I'll lose my ID too if you promise to find it! Lol much love and respect to you Mister Hanks! God bless
— MaRika (@marikamondays) October 6, 2015 @tomhanks Tom I found your friend on the beach. If you still need it my office will get to you. pic.twitter.com/1BLJMpvhzf
— Damian Samuels (@DamianSamuels) October 6, 2015 @tomhanks the old dropping the student ID in the park ploy.
— Mort Barry (@mortbarry) October 6, 2015
